content: i had an idea for horns so even though i had nothing to add them to at that moment i had to work them up before i forgot you should end up with a slightly curvy horn that is approximately 4 inches tall a larger or smaller hook will change the size of your horns i used worsted weigh yarn for mine thinner or thicker yarn will also change your size 4 5mm hook - worsted weight yarn - color of choice worked in the round
